state.text: Fret not, Earthlings. After we’re done here, the scraps of your vehicles will help make up the mightiest fleet of starships in the galaxy!

case.state: This world has changed a lot since the first Earthlings I knew lived here…

Would you care to know where that cruel, cowardly boy got it all from? All his toys? …His troops?

The sight will petrify you with such fear, Earthling, you won’t even be able to flee.
Believe me, watching you do that thing you did has not been a proud moment. To be fair, though…it can’t compare to the dread you’re about to feel. Let me show you what my second form looks like…

Believe me, watching you do…whatever that was supposed to be…has not been the highlight of my visit here. Let’s be fair, though… The sight of my second form is about to repay that shock a hundredfold.
The awkward feeling is mutual. But I will do what I must to complete my mission.
How fierce you two are. You Earthlings are so full of temerity… I shouldn’t be surprised you can maintain a foolish attitude like that even in the presence of my mighty PSI.
How dare you… I now must squash you like the bug that you are!
Jotaro… You’ve realized a novel PSI technique, and your PSI is so developed it’s manifested into a clear form of its own… But you’re still half a century too early to challenge my true might!

{big}{b}…!{!reset}

Oh, the birds of Earth aren’t an issue… We’ll just put them in zoos or open a wildlife reserve on this planet once we’ve dealt with you Earth people. The crows have the same substance use problem you do, though.

This world has stolen weapons secrets that threaten my own’s very existence! You think you can buy my loyalty with a veneral worker?! Can one of those cradle your infant self in her arms every night, inspire you to go out and fill your heart with memories, teach you what is to truly love?!
Perhaps you’re about to perish braver than most, Cup Man. Or perhaps you’re simply about to perish. For good this time.
Watch, Queen of Hatred! I’ll show you what a real transformation looks like!
And that destiny will be resolved…right here, right now.
You’re more capable than I thought… But your strength is still nothing before my true power!

You cannot prevail here. You will fight me alone in a world of darkness. ~Player~! This is the last you’ll see of Earth!
What you see now is a mere droplet of my true power. Make your peace now. Fear…will petrify you.

You really aren’t an ordinary Earthling. I can’t see into your mind at all. It’s like if I aimed a telescope at this planet’s star with no filter…!

state.text: {eb}•You cannot grasp the true form of Giygas’s attack!{!reset}

case.state: Your skill at this game is so nasty that it’s something of a travesty.
Have we idled here enough? Are you satisfied, ~name~?

state.text: You’ve been keeping pace with me, so maybe I’ll remember your name. ~Name~, was it? I’ll tell the story of your last stand here after this world is in ashes.

case.state: Can’t I rely on any of you?
Are those good ones?
Are these good ones?
You can’t defeat me, by the way.

You’re serious about trying to oppose me, ~player~?
How fearless…and how futile.
You stood no chance. Get out of my way.
Go home, ~name~! You’ve proven you won’t get anything done here.
Futile!
A-are you trying to defeat me with pity…?
I can’t believe you’re the same species as the man who stole our PSI…
You’ve lost again.
Is this the best Earth has?
Surrender now, and I’ll look the other way from your impertinence. I’ll drop you off at the closest habitable world once I’m done with this one…
Surrender now, Earthling, and you won’t suffer…
Oh, ~name~. You’re up.
You know, ~name~, I’m pretty good at card games.
Thought you could outdo me, ~name~?
What are you doing, ~name~?!
Focus, ~name~!
I can’t have you failing me now, ~name~!
~Name~, mind the mission! You’ve just lost the hand!
{gy}“You see it, ~name~…”

{gy}“It burns,
~name~…”

{gy}“…I’m so sad…
.....~name~.”

{gy}“It’s… hatred…
.....~name~.”

{gy}“They say I can’t take… what I dish out…
.....~name~.”
And this day…it’s the day that destiny is resolved.
{gy}“~name~!”

state.text:
Your stolen PSI is powerless against the true article!
Give up!
Foolish Earthlng! You should never have considered your PSI fit to challenge mine!

case.state: Your PSI is as feeble as any Earthling! Mine dwarfs yours in power as a star dwarfs a planet!
Dreadfully feeble… You call that PSI power? Yours is nothing before mine!
You’ll be seeing shining stars tonight!
Your life is but a twinkle, the winking of an eye…
Of course you lost. This isn’t some bedtime story… There are no courageous bird-men to aid you, no crystal hooks to whisk you away to safety…
Even all the wisdom of your world wouldn’t be enough to overcome me.
I’ve spent decades preparing for a battle I can’t afford to lose. How do you expect to prevail?
Courage like yours is no substitute for strength or wit…
My triumph involves no luck.
Insects like you would do better to scurry along than to keep at this…
My strength has no equal. Why did you think it was me they sent?
Well, buy me some peanuts and Cracker Jacks.
Who set you against me, anyway? I’ll have you returning to the dust, where you belong…
Even a phantom like you can’t stand up to me. My PSI will grant you everlasting rest…
I will neutralize all threats to my world’s survival! No Earthling can be allowed to wield PSI!
You lose once more.
You lose again, Earthling.
Maria!
What selfish desires drive you, insect? I came here to save my planet!
Impress me, and maybe I will let you see through my eyes. I can grant you one chance to see your world before you leave it forever.
You… You’re awfully long-lived for an Earthling. That it falls on me to put out the ever-burning flame of your life… It’s an honor and a shame.
It’d be a shame for centuries of wisdom like your own to be lost for the crimes of Earth’s humans… Cooperate, and you’ll be spared.
It’s a shame for centuries of wisdom like your own to be lost… But you’ve forced my hand by indulging in the Earthlings’ stolen PSI! You’re a threat to my world, and I can show you no mercy!
Neutralize D_destiny sequence
I can’t…no! I have to!
Calm down… Calm down and focus!
Yuh-huh.
What do you mean, nuh-uh? My powers dwarf your imagination, and I’m not even in my second form.
Oh, well, guess I can’t defeat you after all. I guess I’ll go tuck myself in… Not!
And I’m not sure you realize how little your bravery affects the outcome of my mission, which is not.
Well, well. Are you ready to finally spill your secret?
You can’t get me, Earthling! I’m a space boy!
You thought this electric cacophony could hinder me, Earthling? You are no warrior… You are a jester.
You know, the only reason I haven’t just broken your Mad Car or turned it against you is because I find its antics interesting.
This had better work.
Not that this changes anything. There are plenty more where that came from…and none of them can stand up to my power.
You know, that boy is a great threat to my forces and a major thorn in my side, yet I don’t feel grateful, ~wario~.
That’s the difference between you and him. As much as the boy is a problem and I need him gone yesteryear, I must recognize his bravery and selflessness.
What’s happening to your connection?
Again…?
For gravity’s sake. How about I just use my telepathy, save you the processing power? You clearly need it.
What’s going on over there?
This alliance may have been a mistake…
How unreliable…
Your PSI power must be at a rank of its own…among Earthlings, that is. Do you dare show me what you’re capable of, ~aqua_konosuba~?
Run off and perish quietly with the other ugly Earthlings.
Good gravity, it’s as touchy as the Atomic Power Robots…
It…it can’t be! This woman is the legendary Super Saiyan?!
This power…! This is impossible! Not the legendary Super Saiyan!

…What?! I couldn’t sense that motion at all…
Did you…stop the flow of time, Earthling?
The soldier from the mountains…!
Wait a minute. What did you do just now?
Tch! Your resolve is great and you guard your secrets well…but not well enough. I’ve figured out the mystery behind your PSI technique!
Too slow, too slow!
Usless, useless!
Feeble, feeble!
Not good enough, ~jotaro~!

{eb}•Psst! Hey! It’s me, DP! I got ahold of these prayer lines before the game started, noticed ~rogue_xmen~ didn’t have one, and thought hey, what the hell, may as well leave a lil’ after-Easter egg for ya, right?
•Don’t worry about the whole “Ultimate Eldritch Nightmare Beast Destroying the World” thing, I got my buddy Joe from Capcom Vs. Whatever 3 on the mama. He’s got it in the bag. Love that guy.
•I’m just here to tell you that I’m looking out for ya on the other side of your screen, alright? Take care of yourself, because in your reality, there are no Fox execs to reboot you seven years later when shit goes south!
•So eat your veggies, brush your bitey whities, and make sure you and your friends are regularly checking your testicles and/or breasts for possible cancerous lumps! That’s all I’m really trying to say here.{!reset}
